Summary: Gold in color I could see a refletion of the ground houses trees on it.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oneonta
There were no other sightings in Oneonta on or around May 16th 1996
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my kids home. I was talking to my sonand looked at him when I saw it. I told the kids to look at it and they saw it to. I drove fast to my house so we could see it from our house. But when we got out the car and ran to the frount of the house but it wsa gone. We talked about it for a long time
